titleStmt.title: My Lords, I can assure your Lordships that you are infinitely admir'd for the fervent zeal and constancy, you have allways had for the Church of England, ...
titleStmt.author: James, Elinor. ca. 1645-1719.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
Desires that the Lords "reclaim" James II by not allowing "Priests and Jesuits nor any Roman Catholicks to come about him", rather than support the Prince of Orange.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
